law.catch_line: Identification Cards For Full Time Deputies
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 139, Sec. 68 effective July 1, 2012. See 2012, 139, Sec. 229.] The sheriff shall issue to every full-time deputy employed by the sheriff an identification card bearing the deputy's photograph and identifying information. The secretary of public safety and security may adopt regulations relative to the form, content and issuance of identification cards and to the carrying thereof by deputies.
